Package com.amplifyframework.hub

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HubCategoryBehavior
    Defines the client behavior (client API) consumed by the app for collection and sending of Analytics events.
    HubEvent.Data<T>
    Interface that should be implemented by any type used as an event payload.
    HubEventFilter
    A filter which can be used to control which HubEvents a subscribed HubSubscriber will receive from the Hub.
    HubSubscriber
    An instance of the HubSubscriber may be passed to the HubCategory.subscribe(HubChannel, HubSubscriber) or the HubCategory.subscribe(HubChannel, HubEventFilter, HubSubscriber) methods to subscribe to various types of Hub events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AWSHubPlugin
    An implementation of the HubPlugin which dispatches messages via an ExecutorService.
    HubCategory
    Amplify has a local eventing system called Hub.
    HubCategoryConfiguration
    Configuration for the Hub category, that also references configuration(s) for its managed plugins.
    HubEvent<T>
    An event is the top-level data envelope that gets passed around on the Hub.
    HubEventFilters
    Provides some common implementations of the HubEventFilter.
    HubPlugin<E>
    Abstract class that a plugin implementation of Hub Category would extend.
    SubscriptionToken
    A SubscriptionToken is returned by the Hub when creating a new subscription for a HubSubscriber.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HubChannel
    HubChannel represents the channels on which Amplify category messages will be dispatched.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HubException
    Exception thrown by Hub category plugins.
